document_name: Improving the efficiency and accessibility of judiciary through implementation of the Law on legal aid and promotion of mediation

outputs.output_descr: Objective of this project is to support the implementation of the Law on legal aid and amended Law on mediation through further upgrading of the established system for legal aid provision and developing the Mediation Center's capacities as well as promoting borh institutes in Montenegro in order to enable their sustainability and efficient functioning.

project_descr: Improving the efficiency and accessibility of judiciary through implementation of the Law on legal aid and promotion of mediation
project_title: Improving the efficiency and accessibility of judiciary
